name: Majespecter Cat - Nekomata
effectText: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Majespecter" card from your Deck to your hand during the End Phase of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Majespecter Cat - Nekomata" once per turn. While this card is in your Monster Zone, your opponent cannot target it with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
